com.adidas.ui.adapters

Class AdidasIndexableAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
        • com.adidas.ui.adapters.AdidasIndexableAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SectionIndexer, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilterableAdapter

    public class AdidasIndexableAdapter<T>
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
implements android.widget.SectionIndexer
    Reusable adapter for the list which should support android.widget.SectionIndexer interface for sections indexing.

      • getHeaderState

        public int getHeaderState(int position)
        Computes the desired state of the header for the given position of the first visible list item. Allowed return values are HEADER_GONE, HEADER_VISIBLE or HEADER_PUSHED_UP.

      • configureHeader

        public void configureHeader(android.view.View header,
                            int position,
                            int alpha)
        Configures the header view to match the first visible list item.
        Parameters:
        header - pinned header view.
        position - position of the first visible list item.
        alpha - fading of the header view, between 0 and 255.

      • setShowHeaders

        public void setShowHeaders(boolean showHeaders)
        Specify wether to show the section headers or not.
        Parameters:
        showHeaders - true to show section headers, false otherwise.
